name: ArrDee
description: '''Riley Jason Davies''' (born 17 September 2002), known professionally as '''ArrDee''', is a British rapper. His debut mixtape, ''[[Pier Pressure (ArrDee mixtape)|Pier Pressure]]'', was released on 18 March 2022, peaking at number 2 on the [[UK Singles Chart]]. ArrDee has received multiple gold and platinum plaques from the [[British Phonographic Industry]] (BPI) and [[Recorded Music NZ]] (RMNZ).
